text: Tremolite is a amphibole silicate mineral. The fibrous form is one of the most dangerous types of asbestos, and is often found as a contaminant in other mineral products such as talc and vermiculite. == Incidents == Tremolite has been involved in several product recalls and lawsuits: *A lawsuit was filed involving contaminated baby powder made by Johnson and Johnson. *Tremolite sometimes occurs as a contaminant in vermiculite *In 2019, a Jojo Siwa makeup kit was recalled after it tested positive for tremolite == References == Category:Asbestos Category:Inosilicates
title: Tremolite
